description: Interface definition for note-related operations in the application layer of the note keeper project. It specifies asynchronous methods for CRUD operations on notes, with relevant request and response DTOs.
external_methods: Task<NoteResponse?> GetNoteAsync(Guid id, CancellationToken ct = default)
Task<NoteResponse> CreateNoteAsync(CreateNoteRequest request, CancellationToken ct = default)
Task<NoteResponse?> UpdateNoteAsync(Guid id, UpdateNoteRequest request, CancellationToken ct = default)
Task<bool> DeleteNoteAsync(Guid id, CancellationToken ct = default)

classes.name: INoteService
classes.description: Interface defining asynchronous CRUD operations for notes within the application layer.

methods.name: GetNoteAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its unique identifier asynchronously.

methods.name: CreateNoteAsync
methods.description: Creates a new note based on the provided request object asynchronously.

methods.name: UpdateNoteAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its id with data from the request object asynchronously.

methods.name: DeleteNoteAsync
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id, returning true if the deletion was successful, asynchronously.
